Name: Serpent Assault Enrage
Desc:
[Assault Skill]
Summons an enraged Water Dragon activating Octopunch during Assault. Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Increases Serpent Assault skill DAMAGE with more knowledge of the Assault skill.
Required Skills: Serpent Stone Lv. 1 or above

H.Old:
Consumes 50 MP, attacks up to 6 enemies at 420% damage 4 times for 5 sec. Disappears after attacking 15 times.
[Passive Effects: Serpent Assault Final Damage +100%]
H.New:
MP Cost: 50. Summons a Water Dragon for 5 sec.
The Water Dragon periodically attacks up to 6 enemies at 420% Damage 4 times. Disappears if attacking a single enemy 15 times.
[Passive Effects: Serpent Assault Final Damage +100%]
